Bowie.Montpelier, Maryland: Montpelier, Prince George's County, Maryland, USA, (zip codes 20708, 20709) is a Levitt community outside the corporate boundaries of Laurel. Located near the Baltimore-Washington Parkway, it was built in the late 1960s. There are 4 models of houses in the Levitt style, with mirror images giving 8 different floorplans.
